summary: Diff implements major frontend world/visual upgrades: realistic road textures with markings overlay, enhanced deterministic power lines with raycast disabled, a more detailed truck model (per summary), NPC traffic with spawn/recycle behavior and raycast disabled, added highway + bridge/overpass meshes with guardrails, and a gas stop structure using generated metal textures. However, the diff summary does not show the required generated texture image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated (only referenced in code). Also includes unrequested driving audio + mute state integration.
